name: Sir Timothy Little & the Knights of Little Land
name_original: Sir Timothy Little & the Knights of Little Land
description:
The Little Princess has been captured by the evil Sir Pewtrard.  With his own warriors and the vicious Gumble army at his side, not to mention a monster-making machine, he intends to conquer Little Land.  Sir Timothy is the kingdoms only hope!

___________________________________________________________________________________

I made this with an old version of GameMaker over 15 years ago.  It was the first video game I ever made and as janky and clumsy as it is, I think it has some charm.  As a first effort, I'm still quite proud of it.

Credits:

Game production, design, implementation and graphics - Bazzatron9000

Music - Oliver Neve

YoYo Games for creating GameMaker Studio
